searchSql.baseSql: SELECT A.ID, A.CASE_CODE, A.DATELAMP, A.NAME, A.PART_CODE, A.INST_CODE, A.ASSIGNEE AS ASSIGNEE_OLD, A.EST_PART_TIME, A.RED_LOCK, A.END_TIME, A.status AS status_OLD, A.create_time, (select max(uoj.org_id) from sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj where uoj.username=a.ASSIGNEE) as ORG_ID ,a.WFE_NAME FROM ((SELECT ART.ID_ AS ID, TW.CASE_CODE, DATEDIFF(DAY, tp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) AS DATELAMP, ART.NAME_ AS NAME, ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS PART_CODE, ART.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, ART.ASSIGNEE_ AS ASSIGNEE, ART.create_time_ create_time, TP.EST_PART_TIME, TP.RED_LOCK, NULL AS END_TIME, 'RUN' as status,wfe.WFE_NAME as WFE_NAME FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW TW INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART ON ART.PROC_INST_ID_ = TW.INST_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN TP ON TP.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE AND TP.PART_CODE = ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on TW.BUSINESS_KEY=wfe.WFE_CODE WHERE 1=1 <ifNotNull casecode> AND TW.CASE_CODE = #casecode# </ifNotNull> )UNION( SELECT AHT.ID_ AS ID, TW.CASE_CODE, DATEDIFF(DAY, TP.EST_PART_TIME, AHT.END_TIME_) AS DATELAMP, AHT.NAME_ AS NAME, AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS PART_CODE, AHT.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, AHT.ASSIGNEE_ AS ASSIGNEE, AHT.start_time_ AS create_time, TP.EST_PART_TIME, TP.RED_LOCK, AHT.END_TIME_ AS END_TIME ,AHT.DELETE_REASON_ as status,wfe.WFE_NAME as WFE_NAME FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW TW INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST AHT ON AHT.PROC_INST_ID_ = TW.INST_CODE AND (AHT.DELETE_REASON_='completed' or AHT.DELETE_REASON_='ACTIVITI_DELETED' or AHT.DELETE_REASON_='deleted') LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN TP ON TP.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE AND TP.PART_CODE = AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on TW.BUSINESS_KEY=wfe.WFE_CODE WHERE 1=1 <ifNotNull casecode> AND TW.CASE_CODE = #casecode# </ifNotNull> )) A

SELECT A.ID, A.CASE_CODE, A.DATELAMP, A.NAME, A.PART_CODE, A.INST_CODE, A.ASSIGNEE AS ASSIGNEE_OLD, A.EST_PART_TIME, A.RED_LOCK, A.END_TIME, A.status AS status_OLD, A.create_time, (select max(uoj.org_id) from sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj where uoj.username=a.ASSIGNEE) as ORG_ID ,a.WFE_NAME FROM ((SELECT ART.ID_ AS ID, TW.CASE_CODE, DATEDIFF(DAY, tp.EST_PART_TIME, GETDATE()) AS DATELAMP, ART.NAME_ AS NAME, ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS PART_CODE, ART.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, ART.ASSIGNEE_ AS ASSIGNEE, ART.create_time_ create_time, TP.EST_PART_TIME, TP.RED_LOCK, NULL AS END_TIME, 'RUN' as status,wfe.WFE_NAME as WFE_NAME FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW TW INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART ON ART.PROC_INST_ID_ = TW.INST_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN TP ON TP.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE AND TP.PART_CODE = ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on TW.BUSINESS_KEY=wfe.WFE_CODE WHERE 1=1 <ifNotNull casecode> AND TW.CASE_CODE = #casecode# </ifNotNull> )UNION( SELECT AHT.ID_ AS ID, TW.CASE_CODE, DATEDIFF(DAY, TP.EST_PART_TIME, AHT.END_TIME_) AS DATELAMP, AHT.NAME_ AS NAME, AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS PART_CODE, AHT.PROC_INST_ID_ AS INST_CODE, AHT.ASSIGNEE_ AS ASSIGNEE, AHT.start_time_ AS create_time, TP.EST_PART_TIME, TP.RED_LOCK, AHT.END_TIME_ AS END_TIME ,AHT.DELETE_REASON_ as status,wfe.WFE_NAME as WFE_NAME FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW TW INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST AHT ON AHT.PROC_INST_ID_ = TW.INST_CODE AND (AHT.DELETE_REASON_='completed' or AHT.DELETE_REASON_='ACTIVITI_DELETED' or AHT.DELETE_REASON_='deleted') LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN TP ON TP.CASE_CODE = TW.CASE_CODE AND TP.PART_CODE = AHT.TASK_DEF_KEY_ left join sctrans.SYS_WFE_TEMPLATE as wfe on TW.BUSINESS_KEY=wfe.WFE_CODE WHERE 1=1 <ifNotNull ransomcode> AND TW.BIZ_CODE = #ransomcode# </ifNotNull> )) A
